title: Akuma To Love Song Encore
alternative_title: Akuma to Love Song: Encore ; Akuma to Rabu Songu Ankooru ; 悪魔とラブソング アンコール ; 恶魔拉法颂～安可篇～
status: Akuma to Love Song: Encore ; Akuma to Rabu Songu Ankooru ; 悪魔とラブソング アンコール ; 恶魔拉法颂～安可篇～
description:
Description :
        New short serialization to commemorate the upcoming live-action adaptation of the manga. Akuma to Love Song: Encore was compiled in the re-release of volume 8 of the original series, which was released on July 21, 2021.
